original_title: Sri Lanka rupee opens at 321.70/322.00 to the US dollar
original_body_lines: ECONOMYNEXT – Sri Lanka’s rupee opened at 321.70/322.00 to the US dollar on Wednesday from 321.50/322.00 the previous day, dealers said.
A bond maturing on 01.06.2026, was quoted at 13.90/95 percent.
A bond maturing on 15.09.2027 was quoted at 14.00/10 percent.
A bond maturing on 01.07.2028 was quoted at 14.15/25 percent.
The Colombo Stock Exchange was up in mid-day trade; The All Share Price Index was up 0.08 percent at 10,693. The S&P SL20 was up 0.04 percent at 3,085. (Colombo/Jan3/2024)
